title: China Consumed Twice the Electricity of the US in 2025: CCTV
description: China used more than double the electricity of the US in 2025, China Central Television reported Saturday, citing data from the National Energy Administration.
content: China used more than double the electricity of the US in 2025, China Central Television reported Saturday, citing data from the National Energy Administration.
